meanings.definition: A person who supports the use of paper money issued by the government.
meanings.sent1: The greenbackers in our town believe in using government-issued money.
meanings.sent2: Many greenbackers attended the rally to show their support for paper currency.
meanings.sent3: The greenbackers had a picnic to celebrate their love for government money.
meanings.sent4: In the land of greenbackers, paper currency reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The greenbackers proudly display their government-issued bills.

meanings.definition: A group advocating for the use of government-issued currency.
meanings.sent1: We joined the greenbackers to promote the use of official money.
meanings.sent2: The greenbackers' organization works tirelessly to support government currency.
meanings.sent3: At the meeting, the greenbackers shared their enthusiasm for paper money.
meanings.sent4: The greenbackers stand united in their mission to endorse government-issued bills.
meanings.sent5: Joining the greenbackers means advocating for government currency.
